title: Scoring your documents
subtitle: Create the perfect resume and cover letter
description: Scoring your resumes and cover letters helps you perfect each document. Get customized feedback on ways to improve your resume based on best practices from industry experts.

steps.description: While the term 'resume' is used below, all steps apply to cover letters (in the corresponding section of the site).
Click on 'Resumes' in the top bar or side menu.
Click 'Edit' on the resume card that you want to score.
A popup will appear when we've scored your resume with an overall score and suggestions for improvements.
Each tab corresponds to a different "Best Practice" and offers suggestions for improvements.

steps: The Accomplishments listed in each tab are ones we've determined could be updated to be even stronger.
Read the suggestion and then click 'Update' next to any line item that you want to edit.
Re-run the scorer after any updates to see your score improve!
